operate_knob.description: Operate the knob to set the temperature of the oven.

sanitize_knob.description: Sanitize the knob to ensure hygiene during usage.

rotate_knob.description: Rotate the knob to change the function of the oven.

clean_knob.description: Clean the knob to ensure proper functioning and hygiene.

sanitize_oven.description: Clean the body of the oven for maintaining hygiene.

clean_oven.description: Clean the body of the oven to maintain hygiene.

sanitize_all_parts.description: Clean the knob and body of the oven to ensure cleanliness.

operate_oven.description: The operation of the oven includes setting the temperature by rotating the knob.

clean_whole_oven.description: Clean both the knob and the body of the oven to ensure cleanliness and proper function.

oven_operation.description: The operation of the oven first involves adjusting the setting of the oven by rotating the knob.
